item.title: Provence - South of France
item.description: We have been thinking to visit South of France for a long time. Writing the dairy for this trip is very unique as it had so many vivid events one after another. We took a packaged deal with one of the travel agency (Hotel and Bus with Sleeping-Berth) After the event-full after-noon at Cite Perfecture we started at 9 P.M from Paris. It was not a bad start till the first stop.
